scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build: rm -rf backend/dist && npm run build --prefix frontend && mv frontend/dist backend/
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run lint" "npm --prefix frontend run lint"
scripts.test:e2e: npm run start:test & sleep 5 && npm --prefix e2e test
